content.detailedDescription:
On april 7, 2007 at 9:30 p.M. my son in law noticed a strange light in the sky as he was getting something out of his car.  he called me, my daughter and son to the back deck.  we saw a triangular shaped object above the tree line on the horizon.  with the naked eye we could see different colors of lights, blue, green, red, white.  when we viewed it through binoculars, we could clearly see that the lights were chasing around the outside edge, and the points of the triangle were rounded.  the object appeared to be jerky, but it could have been our hands.  it stayed stationary in the sky for over three hours.  we didn't stare at it the entire time, but went back frequently to look.  it was gone after about three hours.

the sky was beautifully clear.  we were out in the country and the night sky was very bright.  we often go outside just to marvel at the beauty.  he just happened to do that and saw the object.

we identified several airplanes while the object was there, and it was definitely not an airplane.  we thought it must have been a satellite, but we have seen satellites before, and they move rather quickly across the sky.  this didn't move at all.  

we don't know what it was.
content.summary: Triangular shaped, with chasing lights above the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what this was. i am not an avide believer, but if this was a ufo, it would be the second ever i saw. my mother, sister, then boyfriend and me were driving home to rohnert park from petaluma california in i think the summer of 2003 0r 2004. i didn't drive then, so i don't know the exact road, but we took the highway which was occupied by many cars. it was between 10:30 pm and 11:30 pm when we were on the road, stopped due to an accident up ahead. i was in the back seat driver side looking out the window when i noticed this huge dark shape maybe two or three miles off lingering in the sky. the road was higher than the valley below and there must have been an airport or something because there where light towers below the thing. it was about two miles above the towers. there was also three heliocopters flying around it. i informed everyone in the car to look out the window and nobody could tell what was going on. i rolled down the window and could hear the heliocopters, but it was so wierd because they where circling this huge black triangular thing, which didn't seem to make any noise. the traffic started moving again, so as we drove away i kept watching the whole situation with the heliocopters examining this thing. when we got home my mom turned on the news to see if there was anything about it, because a lot of people must have seen it as they waited on the road. nothing on any station reported anything. my sister and boyfriend could care less, but all week, all month me and my mom listened up for anything on the news. we never herd a thing so dismissed it. but i'll never forget how strange the whole thing was.
content.summary: Dark or black, underside with multiple lights in a triangular shape, slow moving

content.detailedDescription: I was only seven, and i don't reacall the month or day, but it had to have been summer because it was a hot sunshiney day in salem oregon. i was in my glassed-in atrium/frontporch finding our geko when i looked up and out the window and saw what i did...Across the street was a parking lot with a warehouse to the right, another home to the left and a commercial railway was behind it all. there was a big willowy tree across the average residential sized stree and it was above that, off a distance. however, it seemed very close... it was the sive of a car and it slowly inched forward over the warehouse. it was silver and shiney, the sun was reflexting off of it, but i could see white lights all around it and under it. it was a totally stereotypical looking ufo. i watched it transfixed because i didn't know what it was... it stopped and seemed to be idling for a good five minutes, then slowly moved forward again. it almost seemed like it was looking at the neighboorhood. it stopped again and then zipped away so fast in the direction it was going. i ran outside to see where it had been and where it went, but it was gone. no exaust or trail left behind. nextdoor my best friend and two neighboorhood kids i played with were standing in the front yard, jaws dropped and eyes wide. they saw it too. we told our parents and they all said it was an airplane. i remember asking if they had flying cars, because it was that big and shiney. but to this day i swear what i saw was not an airplane. i was only seven, but years later when i heard of ufos i knew what i had seen. i remember i was in such awe, i didn't know what it was, but it was so amazing it kept my attention unlike anything else. my friends where scared but transfixed too. seeing something so strang so young makes me convinced i saw a ufo because i had never heard of such a thing before.
content.summary: Smooth rounded disk with white lights. very shiney silver metallic

content.detailedDescription: While leaving my apartment building to go to work, i looked up at the sky to the east, and saw a small object about 1500ft agl and 1/4 mile away moving to the south-southeast very slowly.  this object was black in color, metallic, and had the appearance of a large wavy bubble.  the sun reflected off of it every so often, which makes me believe that it had a dull coating underneath.  this object made no sound.  after maintaining it's course to the south-southeast, my view was disrupted by a stand of trees.  after re-positioning myself, i saw the object again.  however, my view only lasted a few seconds, as the trees once again occluded my view.  i got in my vehicle to go to work, and tried to find the object again.  my route took me along a near-parrallel course with the object, but i was unable to locate it after about a minute.
content.summary: Black metallic bubble-like--very reflective

content.detailedDescription: I was not aware of the alleged u.F.O event at the time. i was watching what i thought might have been starting of a tornado. the region was under heavy storm warning. i took pictures with my new hp photosmart m627. the original cloud shape stood motionless for several hours. i would play with my daughter and then come back to observe every 20 minutes or so and snap a picture.  suddenly the cloud shape veered off towards the south. i follow the cloud with a fascination for this was an amazing weather event. the cloud changed form into a ball with a greenish hue (my camera does show the colour that is described). the cloud changed direction rapidly and went flying towards my fixed position. it was frightening the speed that the cloud came in i took some video unfortunately my video that shows the speed that it came was not aimed at the cloud as i ran for the condo. anyway as i was looking at the pictures i saw something in the clouds that struck me as very odd. in one picture is an orb. the camera is facing towards the south the is setting far in the west so it seems unlikely be a sun refraction i believe that refraction of the lenses happens if you take a picture towards the sun. any way in a subsequent picture the orb seems to divides into four orbs and taken a formation. these orbs were not observable when i saw the images initially.
content.summary: In one picture is an orb. the camera is facing towards the south the is setting far in the west so it seems unlikely be a sun refraction i believe that refraction of the lenses happens if you take a picture towards the sun. any way in a subsequent picture

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my bathroom at about 10pm , it faces the front of my house. i went to open the window because it got cool out and noticed an extremely bright light in the sky. it looked like a star but way too close. i observed it for about 2 minutes before i went and got my binoculars. once i saw it through the specs i knew i had to try and film it. i have seen this kind of thing before here and i live very close to picatinny arsenal. is it something from there? i don't know. i got my camera and it had power... once i saw it zoomed and closer i knew this was no star or airplane. i definitely felt relieved that i caught it on tape because i knew none of my friends would believe me. 
so in the a.M. i will get it uploaded and send it on over. it was still there when my tape ran out.
content.summary: 10pm looked out my bathroom window and saw a very bright light (not moving)

content.detailedDescription:
Took two pictures-one of which shows some detail. got bored-after 20 minutes-looked away and it was gone.  taken from top deck of ship on yangzee
river as we were cruising to the 3 gorges on way to dam.












       don't know how to send attachments
content.summary: Flat circular object

content.detailedDescription:
In september of 1991, i witnessed what became known in the local media as the concord lights. each morning(approx 6-7am) and each evening (approx 7-8pm), i witnessed these orbes hanging approximately 2500 ft above the valley floor over or near the merrimack river on the north side of concord , nh. my father, with whom i worked and carpooled also saw what i saw. in fact, several of my friends witnessed this event.
after about 10 days to 2 weeks, the orbs disappeared. beginning a week after the event, rumours began circulating about non-descript men following/watch people around the concord. these rumours persisted until the end of october 1991.
i didn't give this event another thought. i have a very good memory and i would not have forgotten this incredible event. beginning in 2004, i began to have a hazy recall of the concord lights. by 2005, i could recall with great clarity the events. i sent an information request to mufon, but was told there where no previous reports.

i finally questioned both my father and my closest nh friend in 2007. neither man recalls these events.
content.summary: Red, blue, silvery white orbes appear over merrimack valley

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived at my parents��� house at approximately 1030 pm cst (2230) to gather some things i had left there.  a friend of mine who is staying at the house was standing near our shop building, which is approximately 50 yards from the main house, looking into the sky.  when i approached him, he asked if i saw anything flying low and silent on my way there.  i had not seen anything out of the ordinary. 

he described a pair of non-flashing lights, red and blue, on opposing ends of the ���craft.��� it flew on an east-to-west bearing, and quickly altered direction to the north and dimmed to non-visible.  the total duration was 2-4 minutes and was approximately 1 mile away at its closest point to his position.  he also commented that animals in the neighborhood were acting peculiar in that the horses next door were in a state of unrest and that dogs all around the area were barking loudly, many at once.

within 5 minutes of my arrival, two bright lights appeared in polar-opposite positions to each other, one to the northwest, and the other to the southeast.  each one brightened and dimmed at no certain interval and independently of one another.  each one also seemed to ���flicker��� and several times changed from a reddish hue to a bluish or greenish tone.   additionally, there were three short ���flashes��� from the northernmost ���object.���  it may be important to note that two of the 4 observers of this event confirmed that there may have been two distinct lights on the northern object, or possibly two objects.  these two ���objects��� seemed to be on an approximate inclination (relative to our position) of 40���.  the distance from my location could not be determined; therefore i cannot be certain about the approximate height of the object from the ground.

the total duration of this event was around 25 minutes.  by 11:10 pm (2310 hours), neither object was visible.

notes:

weather conditions: clear, full visibility.  75��� f.
lighting conditions: dark, no city street light interference.  location south of midland, texas city limits approximately 7 miles.

it might be worth noting that in 3 different locations local police and sheriff patrol units were sitting beside the road.  also, after leaving the location of our sighting, my friend told me that two patrol units were driving around the area for a period of 15 minutes.
content.summary: Multiple 'irregular' lights in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Getting ready for work and because i always watch the sky.  [as i had seen a silver in color, round, ufo some years ago in the daylight.] well this morning all i saw was a star like object go across the sky and then go out.  i saw the post by glen e. smith and wanted to tell you to go to www/welcome2armageddon.Com/ i am with you on this glen all the way! revised book will be out in about 3-4 weeks.  
bonnie bell
content.summary: Star like object

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a smoker and i go upstairs every day to my top floor and hang my head out of my window to smoke a cigarette. i do this at least 7 or more times a day. so i'm always looking at the same patch of sky, watching the planes fly by (at night) and generally paying close attention to whatever is happening outside.

well on the night of the 21st march i hung my head out of my window as i usually do and started smoking. i caught a glimpse of a streak of light rush off to the left out the corner of my eye. at first i thought to myself that i could have been a reflection off of the window or metal handle as i moved my eyes to look somewhere else, it might have appeared to be something different. you know, as you move your eyes quickly you sometimes catch a glimpse of a light leaving a tail? well that's what i thought it was and i ignored it.

a few minutes later, i was still thinking about it because there were no cars around so it couldn't have been a reflection of light onto my window. there were no stars in the sky because it was partially misty and the stars were unable to shine through. as soon as i started thinking about it, a brilliant bright blue object much like a star shot extremely fast in to the sky and stopped dead still at what i imagine to be 1000ft or more. this object was a very bright blue ball of light that seemingly made no noise. after it shot in to the sky and came to a dead stop instantly, it then started to lower itself down to the ground whilst pulling very large circles as if it was spirally back down toward the ground. at around 500ft (or there-a-bouts) it stopped again, instantly. moved off to the left at a high rate of speed, stopped, pulled 1 or 2 more circles (horizontally) and stopped, darted back off to the right, pulled one last circle before it shot off out of sight.

at this point i couldn't believe me eyes and this object made me all awe-inspired. so i ran downstairs and woke my mother up who was sleeping at the time. i shouted through the door "mum, come upstairs, i want you to see something". she asked me 'what?' i said "quick, there's some strange blue light flying around outside". so she got up as fast as she could, and we went back upstairs to the window and gazed outside.

for two minutes this object did not appear. i refrained from telling my mother what i had seen, and i was beginning to get frustrated at the idea of telling her what i had seen (however unbelievable it was) and she might or might not believe me.

sure enough, 2 or 3 minutes later this object instantly reappeared and shot back up into the sky and stopped dead still at around 1000 ft. exactly the same thing it did the first time, only this time i had a witness who could verify what it was i was looking at. as soon as it did this my mum let out a whale, almost as if she was not expecting to see this object appear in this way. after stopping at 1000ft (or there-a-bouts) it started lowering its altitude very quickly (almost free-fall speed), but at the same time as its altitude was decreasing it was pulling large horizontal circles. large as in, 100ft or so, but seemingly effortless. it again stopped instantly, darted off to the left, began lowering its altitude once more whilst pulling these large yet swift horizontal circles, stopping dead still, darting off of the right, pulling yet more circles. it stopped for a final time before zipping off extremely quickly, almost leaving a tail behind it as it shot out of sight.

i for one am very pleased that my mother was there to experience the same series of events, even though the two events were only 2 to 3 minutes apart. i felt as if it would be pointless if i tried to explain it, and perhaps looked at as a nut-case (even from my own mother).

i did ask her what she thought it was, she too didn't think it was a helicopter, or a plane. it made absolutely no noise. this object was half a mile away at best. if it had been a combustion engine powering this thing, we would have heard it for sure. but it made absolutely no sound, not a whisper. it also moved in a way that i didn't think was possible. it almost seemed to be flying on air, effortlessly moving itself from side to side, pulling circles and traveling at a high rate of speed with the capabilities to stop at will in an instant.

i hope this description of this incident is clear enough for you to draw up your own conclusions. i did however speak to some friends of mine once, recently. we were discussing ufos over a program called teamspeak. the conversation didn't begin with ufos, but it sure ended up sending a chill down my spine. why? because my friend claims that he has seen exactly the same object (probably not the same one) but another just like it, performing these same aerial stunts, in the same series of events. witnessed by both him and his friend who live a few miles in opposite directions. they two were on teamspeak. one discussing what was going on, the other listening (as we all were). my friend mike who was discussing what he was looking at, at the time, asked his friend who was a few blocks away if he could see the same object. they both gave running commentaries about the same object, both of whom described the same object i had seen a few nights before.

however, they're in california and i'm in england. so it can't have been the same object... can it?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blue star-like object

content.detailedDescription:
My two older brothers and myself decided to go fishing one sunday afternoon on the great cataraqui river(rideau canal)a few miles north of kingston, ontario, canada. we were about half-way between kingston mills locks and the locks at washburn.
we had rented a 12 foot boat at mount chesney(sunbury)at a local marina and rowed a mile or so into the river to fish the shallow waters for bass and pike.
the sun was quite hot that day and the sky was clear as we fished and chatted.
while fishing we noticed several craft hanging in the sky some distance off(perhaps a mile)we could see about five of these objects lined-up going away from us to the south-west. these objects appeared to ne at different heights at the time but i realised later that this illusion was probably caused by their distance apart. it was impossible to gauge the size of these craft, due to the unknown distance they were from us.They might have been anything from 25 to 100 feet across but in the distance they looked smaller than the latter. these craft one-by-one faded from sight over the next hour or so.
at this point in-time, 1958 - 1960 there were many reports by newspapers of ufo's being sighted around the world. we did not see anything too remarkable about these craft at the time. other than a casual mention to our parents when we returned home we never gave this much thought.
it was not until many years later that i realised the significance of this sightings and described it in a letter and interview to the local newspaper. my revelation was greeted by the public in the usual way that ufo reporters have to endure. 'how much beer did you drink that day?'(none) or 'how long were you out in the sun that day?' i did receive one phone call one evening from a very kind and interested gentleman whose name i didn't ascertain. he was very knowledgeble about ufo's and asked me several questions, mostly about what i have typed here. he did tell me that the rideau valley and canal system between kingston and ottawa was 'a hotbed for ufo activity.' my being candid about my ufo(if you will) experience has led to others in the area coming forth with their own stories to me. these people had waited for years to describe the events being mostly afraid of the sure-derision, that would follow.
this meeting(?) with these beings has changed my life significantly as i finally realised that the god that my fore-fathers worshipped back into biblical times is really one of these beings with only a much-higher, developed technology than our own. i joke with people now and tell them that although i 'have never met god, i have seen his mode-of-transportation!'
i trust that you at mufon will find this useful - - i might add that i don't believe that there was any abduction involved with myself or my two brothers during this incident. the only thing i observed in later years was that they didn't appear comfortable talking to me about it. one of my brothers involved passed away six years and, of course, we are all getting older. i would like to see this ufo phenomena fully explained before i go back to the elements.
i might also add that i think it is a huge mistake to insist that these beings come from far-off planets and galaxies. with the enormity of our planet - in and under the sea and with the ability that these beings possess to hide-at-will, there is likely lots of room right here for an unknown civilization. unfortunately(?) it will probably be up to these beings when they want to be discovered by those lesser- beings that we choose to call 'humans.'
thank you, and good luck,
glen e smith
content.summary: We watched several craft sitting in the sky near to the river where we were fishing from a small boat.

content.detailedDescription:
Vacationing in costa rica when i was watching the volcano erupt pulled out my camera and i started taking pictures. i identify two objects up in the dark sky very close to mouth of the volcano one of them was more like a sphere but at the same time looked more like a open door in the sky,the other object was more like a disc shape, i thought it was coming out of the volcano along with the lava like almost being part of the lava, but those two ojects didn'tmove for about an hour and then disapeard in the dark night.I was skeptical at first, until i got home and started viewing my other pictureswhen i notice that more than a dozen of these flying objects were thereat the time of the eruption, that i couldn't see with the naked eye that night. any aircraft that could fly that close to the mouth of the volcano without melting or blowing up in pieces?

p.S zoom in so you can apreciate better.
content.summary: Taking pictures of the erupting volcano when i saw two floating shapes

these planes fly very high & very fast !!

content.detailedDescription: It was saturday night was very sleepy but hungry decided to grill outside and actually thought to myself mabye ill see something in the sky and it will make all the work grilling worth while . well i did  i noticed a dim light much dimmer than the stars moving so fast out of the east that i called my girlfriend outside so i could have a second opinion i was very exited ! she came out back i had to point it out by blocking the flood light from her eyes with my hand like a horse blind once i had blocked out the flood light she noticed it we agreed on both having a visual on it it and then it glowed extremly bright twice and vanished . i saw some thing similar in houston texas in 02 or 03 same sort of thing had a feeling if i went outside i might see something went out side up on a roof off in the distance a saw a very very bright light head twards me said holy smokes out load to my suprise ther was someone else on the roof who repeted it i said do you see that ? the person said yes and at that moment the light flared and shot straight up and disapeared into sky ! this sighting is what keened my eye to my last sighting ! i seriously dont think these were shooting stars or satilites because they were flying over the land in a straight level line and then when i confirm with others the visual they disapare with a flash . i dont know what these things were but i thought it quite strange it should happen twice !
content.summary: I noticed a dim light in the sky  fly across the sky from the east heading west  extremly fast i called my girlfriend out to verify it when she verified it the light incressed dramadically twice and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
My buddy and i were returning home after a fishing trip. it was about 1am, and we were traveling south along california i-5, somewhere around corning.
i noticed a very bright light coming from behind us, and turned around to see what i thought was a very large plane trying to land on the freeway about a mile and a half behind us. the object dipped it's right wing tip as it came down below 50ft or so, just as if it were a large jet. the object had no lights pointing foward but was very brighly lit from behind. there were two red sphieres following, but not attached to the wing tips. my friend and i both watched for more than 15min. while the object slowly made up the distance between us. we both thought we were going to be in the way of a emergancy landing. the object caught up to us about the time we went under a overpass. the object had to pull up to make it over the overpass and was about 50ft of the ground when it went over us. about this time we both realized that this was no plane, my buddy asked if i see the spaceship. we were moving at about 65mph, and the object maybe 70-75mph. it was a dark triangle wider than a four-lane freeway, and approximately 40ft thick. there were four round very bright lights accross the back, and a row of dimely lit windows accross the top-half of the back behind them. the two red sphieres took positions about 100yrds off each side, and followed along with the triangle. the object passed directley overhead, and moved on approximately 1/2ml. than took a stationary position about 100ft. above the ground off the shoulder on our side of the road. the red sphieres held stationary positions about 1/4ml. off each corner of the triangle. we stopped and got out right underneath the object. it set thier motionless and silent with all lights out for about 5min.. it than without moving foward turned on it's center axis and moved at walking speed north along the edge of the freeway. i wanted to stay longer but my friend was really scared. i felt as if we had been the sights for someones tour bus. i also got the impression that who ever was at the controls, were confused about where they were at, or going.
content.summary: Large triangle approx 100yrds wide, seen over interstate 5 for more than 20min. at less than 100 ft. away.

content.detailedDescription: I was up hiking in what is known as cherokee park, near the wyoming border and i looked up at a plane leaving a contrail, and noticed that the trail abrubtly started dissapating in one spot, in this spot a white orb appeared and hovered in the exact spot for approxiamately 20 minutes and then vanished.
content.summary: White orb hovering in same spot

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving to a house my family owns at a small lake in michigan.  we were traveling north on indiana state hwy 31 at around 11:30 pm, and we were admiring the clear night sky.  the moon was to the south-east of us; what i was assuming was jupiter was to our left; and appearing suddenly in front of us on the horizon was what i thought an unusually bright star or planet.  we talked about it for a couple minutes or so.  it was easy to constantly observe while driving because it was a stationary object in front of us, above the trees on the left side of the road.  as we were looking at it and discussing whether or not it was venus, the light just turned off.  it looked as though an eyelid was closing over the light.  we were totally shocked.  it never reappeared.  as we drove further ahead we saw no towers, nor did we see or hear any helicopters in the air.  i'm curious if anyone else saw anything that night in northern indiana...

p
content.summary: Star-like object disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
El dia de hoy domingo 3 de junio del 2007 mire un objeto que se movia a eso de las 7:15. el objeto cuando se movia parecia un hombre volando en el cielo eso fue el primer objeto, el segundo fue un objeto como nave espacial rojo que le paso a la par de una manera tan rapida que apenas y se ve en el video. pero si usted lo pone en camara lenta lo podra ver.
despues se diviso otro objeto que tambien iba en direccion hacia el sol.
todos en total eran 3 pero hiban a baja velocidad solo el objeto rojo paso rapidisimo a la par del que parecia un humano volador,el cual era de color crema. despues de unos minutos aparecio a lo lejos un avion de propulcion a chorro que parecia quererlos espantar, dejando su humo en forma linear el cual formo despues de unos minutos nuves que hicieron imposible ver lo que paso con los objetos.
content.summary: Avistamiento del mes de junio.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were having lunch outside a restaurant in kearny mesa looked straight up and saw a disk moving across the sky near the moon it appeared to have orange tint we both were just looking up staring i suppose in disbelief (i asked my wife if she was seeing what i was seeing and she said yes) the object was very high in altitude and moving across thesky near the moon, i got up when i realized we had a camera in the car when i returned it was gone what did we see?  .
content.summary: My wife and i were having lunch outside a restaurant in kearny mesa looked straight up and saw a disk moving across the sky near the moon it appeared to have orange tint .

content.detailedDescription: I was walkin my dogs. there was a flash of light, kinda like normal light. i looked up. at first it looked like a spot light. i ran  back home to get a camera. i had to drag the dog. she wouldn't run. we figured out it wasn't a spot light.  it was greenish/blueish. i countinued to walk the dogs and saw it at a different angle. it was a few 100 ft. in the air. it appered to cirle the area, but the circle was kinda wobly.The circle was several hundred feet in diamiter. but at the new angle, i could tell it was slowly gliding down in a circle. like it was coming down for a landing. the two wings were glowing, but you could tell there was a center. when i looked at it, for a second it shined a lighed on me. it's still out there. we recorded some of it on a camera. i just went out and checked on it. it slowed down some. but it was about 70 ft lower.The circle has decreased about 50 ft less. i think it's coming down to land.There are several fields in the area. it's been there for 3 hours now. this is all i can tell for now.
content.shape: Blimp,  Boomerang,  Cigar,  Cone,  Chevron,  Circle,  Cross,  Cylinder,  Diamond
content.summary: Green/blueish

content.detailedDescription:
I enjoy sky watching on several live web cam sites and i have gotten many unknowns over the past month on the east coast. i have started viewing
http://www.Phoenixvis.Net for about a week and caught an object above superstition mountain in the phoenix arizona. i have been viewing these cams with the hope of catching a glimps at the infamous phoenix lights.

what a surprise to have captured an unknown tonight! i have several unknowns (high resolution pics each over 1mb) from several web cams that i haven't submitted or reported for fear of looking foolish for having captured so many in a short time.
content.summary: As seen on http://www.Phoenixvis.Net live web cam picture

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:45 pm (cental time), i went out back to let my 2 dogs out to go to the bathroom.  it was a clear night and the moon was not out yet, so many of the stars were alreaqdy eluminated. immediately up in the southern night sky i observed a bright redish-orange circular type object traveling from the south-southwest towards the north-notheast, at what appeared to be a constant altitude.

although i felt excited and somewhat in disbelief at what i was witnessing, i tried to make sure i remained calm and not get too over excited as i watched the object flying across the sky. i wanted to go grab my binoculars that were in my car, which was at the front of the house, but at the rate of speed this object was flying i knew i would not be able to get back in time before it flew out of sight. 

we live less than 1 mile from our local airport and are 4 miles from eglin afb ("as the crow flys"). i am an aviation enthusiast, so i have a good idea what an airplane looks like and sounds like. there was no sound or any navigational lights on this object as it moved across the sky.

based on my observation angle of the object in relationship to the horizon, i estimate the altitude was between 5,000-10,000 feet.  at those altitudes even small engine airplanes can be heard.  but what struck me as odd, other than the fact there were no navigational lights, was the speed at which this object was traveling.  i estimate the object was crusing at over 1,000 mph and although the trajectory was basically in a stright line, the object seemed to vary its speed (almost like short hesitations or jolts in speed).

i watched the object travel to the north-northeast (towards the vernon & defuniak springs, florida area) for about 60 seconds and then out of sight. this object was too low to be considered a space satilite and had no elluminated vapor trail to be considered a meteor.
content.summary: Up in the soutern sky i saw a brigt star like and circular object streking across the sky night

content.detailedDescription:
Just before 5am i was passing by a south-facing window on the second floor of my house. we are on a high point and can see the horizon. to the south of us are two radio towers with blinking red lights. between and above them i saw a light that at first i thought was the rising sun because of its pink-red color, and its crescent shape-- round towards the top and curved in at the bottom. after a moment, however, i realized that it was in the wrong direction for the sunrise--south--it was probably too high off the ground for it to be the sun yet, and also, it was overcast. as i watched it for a few minutes, it stayed in the same place in the sky, but changed shape from crescent to oval to circle, (in no paticular order). when it was in a round shape, another small dot of light appeared just to the right of it, the same red-pink color, probably 5-10x smaller than the initial light. the second light moved from the upper right side to the lower left side of the first light, but was visible the whole time and i don't think it actually crossed in front of the light, rather moved underneath it. now on the left side, the second light sat there for maybe half a second, then moved towards the bigger light and was absorbed into it. then it turned back into a crescent shape and faded out until it disappeared. 

i stood there for maybe a minute, waiting to see if it would appear again. it did appear-- all of a sudden, no fade in, in exactly the same spot and exactly the same color, in a crescent shape. i watched it for a much shorter time, maybe thirty seconds, and then it disappeared again. i can't remember if it faded out or totally disappeared. 

i thought to run downstairs and get binoculars during all of this, but i didn't want it to disappear while i was gone.

i've been trying to rationalize this and there are only a few answers i can come up with. one, is that there is a municipal airport to the south of us, as well as the boston airport to our northeast, and we often see planes from either airport over our house. however, it was overcast and there was no break in the clouds as far as i could tell that would allow aircraft to be seen. i also didn't hear an aircraft, though it probably would have been too far away to hear. the light also didn't move. it seemed too low in the sky for it to be an aircraft that appeared not to be moving because it's so far away. 

there is no way i mistook the sun for this light, because as i said, it was in a southerly direction. i also checked the sunrise time yesterday, which is listed as 5:09. as soon as the incident was over i checked the clock in my room, and it was exactly 5 am. my clock might be a little off, but i don't think it's off that much. it could have possibly been the sun reflecting off of something in the sky, but again, the sun wasn't up yet and it was overcast. which, by the way, raises another point-- it seemed as if this object was far away. i don't know how high the clouds are when the sky is overcast, but if i saw everything correctly, either te clouds were high and this object was far away, or the object had some quality to it that made it look far away when it was really much closer, beneath the clouds. if the light was really just a hole in the clouds, letting through the light of the rising sun-- again, i'm 95% sure that it was before 5am when i saw it, and even if the sun was starting to come up, i don't think the color of the sky would be that intense pink-red already in the south. 

so thank you very much for documenting this... if you try and contact me about it, please only do so by email.
content.summary: Pink-red object changed shapes, disappeared, reappeared; changed shapes again,; disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my friend for a week. she lives on a farm just outside port rowan. at 11:20pm i was sitting by a camp fire relaxing when i decided to look for the little dipper(the stars were very bright that night). i eventually saw what looked to be a satallite(see them all the time up there). after watching it for approx. 20 sec. move in a straight line, it abruptly dipped like a v. i then knew it was not a sattalite,nor was it likely to be an aircraft in my opinion(i was in air cadets for many years,have taken multiple aircraft identification classes and have been to multiple air shows so i know what a plane flying looks like) so i ran in the house to tell the 2 girls that live there, when we came back outside it was gone. approx. 20 min later i came outside to bbq some late night burgers. i walked over to check where i had seen the ufo and immediatly i saw it in the sky. it was more to the east(right) of where i had originally seen it and it was much closer. it was now hovering. also,i was seeing it between the roofs of two barns(which eventually made it extremely easy to gage the movement). you could now see that it was dull green in colour, giving off a red hue every now and then. if i had to guess i would say it was at least still 60 kms away. for the next half hour all three of us watched this thing "dance" in the sky. it stayed in generally the same area of the sky, but it flew very eratically. it would be going left, then all of a sudden just start going right. down, then up. but it wasn't just vertical or horizontal, this thing was flying at all different angles. also, it's speeds would very alot. it would dive down vertically very slowly then shoot up very fast. we did have a pair  of cheap binoculars which did not help us see it any better(it just looked bigger). we also snapped a couple of pictures with a digital camera which did not come out any good(to far away). it was in the sky for so long that the girls got bored and went back in the house.I watched it for about another 10 min. befor getting informed that my burger was now cold. i went into the house for aprox. 3 min.  to nuke my burger, when i came out it was gone. trust me this was no plane or helicopter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched green light in the sky fly eratically for over 40 min
